211:1: atha khalu asyāṃ ratnaketudhāraṇyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā sarvāvatīyaṃ sahālokadhāturudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭābhūt|
211:2: ye ceha buddhakṣetre koṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ teṣu koṭīśataṃ kāmeśvarāṇāṃ māratvaṃ kārayanti te buddhānubhāvena saṃvignā imāṃ cāturdvīpikāṃ vyavalokayanti sma|
211:4: nūnaṃ pāpīmān nāma māro yastatra cāturdvīpikāyāṃ prativasati tasyaiṣa prabhāvaḥ yo'smatto balavantaḥ īśvarataro mahaujaskaśca|
211:5: atha khalu te mārā vyavalokayanto'drākṣuḥ taṃ māraṃ pāpīmantaṃ koṣāgāre niṣaṇṇaṃ paramadurmanastham|
211:6: atha tat koṭīśataṃ mārāṇāṃ yeneyaṃ cāturdvīpikā yena mārasya pāpīmato bhavanaṃ tenopajagāma|
211:8: kiṃ bhoḥ kāmeśvara ! sarvāvatīyaṃ lokadhāturavabhāsitā tvaṃ ca śokāgāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ|
211:9: atha kāmeśvaro māraḥ teṣāṃ mārakoṭīśatānāṃ vistareṇārocayati sma|
211:10: yat khalu mārṣāḥ jānīyu[ri]haikaḥ śramaṇa utpannaḥ śākyavaṃśāt paramaśaṭho māyāvī|
211:12: ye kecidiha kṛtsnalokadhātau vidvāṃso mahendrā vā nāgendrā vā yakṣendrā vā surendrā vā mahoragendrā vā garuḍendrā vā kinnarendrā vā yāvadanye'pi kecinma[nu]ṣyā vidvāṃsaste sarve tamupāgatāḥ pūjākarmaṇe yāvat ṣaḍvarṣāṇi ekākyadvitīyaṃ niṣadyā lakṣaṇāṃ māyāṃ sādhitavān|
211:13: ahamapi svabaladarśanaṃ cikīrṣuḥ evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkoṭīsainyaparivāraḥ upasaṃkramya samantato'nuparivārya sarvamārabalavikurvaṇa-ṛddhibalaparākramaṃ saṃdarśita[vān|
211:14: paśyaikaṃ romakū]pamapyaham aśakto'smi saṃtrāsayituṃ vā bhīṣayituṃ vā kimaṅga punastasmādāsanāt kampayituṃ kiṃvā punaranyaṃ vighātaṃ kartumiti|
211:15: atha caitena vṛṣalena tādṛśī māyā pradarśitā [prakaṃ]paśca kṛtaḥ yat sasainyo'haṃ parājitaśchinnavṛkṣa iva dharaṇītale nipatitaḥ|
211:16: tena ca tatraiva niṣaṇṇena tādṛśī alakṣaṇā māyā sā[dhitā yayāsau sarvamāraviṣaya]mevā[bhi]bhūtaṃ sādhitavidyāṃ tasmādutthāya sattvebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayāmāsa|
211:17: ye ca kecidiha cāturdvīpikāyāṃ lokadhātau paṇḍitā vijñāstathā mā[yāyāṃ chandakṛtasteṣāṃ cittaṃ] prajānāmi gatyupapattiṃ vā ṣaṭsu gatiṣu|
211:18: ye ca taccharaṇagatāsteṣām ekaromakūpamapi na śaknomi saṃtrāsayituṃ vā saṃkṣobhayituṃ vā [kampayituṃ vā] loke punastasmād visaṃvādayituṃ vā kampayituṃ vā śaknuyām|
211:19: adyaiva ca me pañca paricārikāśatāni viṃśatiśca putrasahasrāṇi sagaṇaparṣadyāni vṛṣalaṃ gautamaṃ [śra]maṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāstasya purato niṣaṇṇāḥ|
211:21: tena hi yūyaṃ balavantaḥ puṇyavanto jñānavantaḥ aiśvaryavantaḥ [suhṛdo bha]vata|
211:27: atha jyotiṣprabho māraḥ imaṃ jambudvīpaṃ vyavalokayāmāsa yatra tathāgataḥ [saṃniṣaṇṇo] dharmaṃ deśayati|
211:28: atha jyotiṣprabho māro bhagavataḥ kāyamadrākṣīt svaraghoṣayukta[stasya dharmade]śanāmaśrauṣīt|
211:29: atha tāvadeva tasya roma[harṣaṇaḥ] saṃtrā[saḥ] utpannaḥ|
211:39: athāparo māraḥ sannimiko nāma taṃ māraṃ pāpīmantamevamāha|
211:47: na cirāt sa śūnyaṃ viṣayaṃ kariṣyati
211:49: atha vanarājo nāma māraḥ sa māraṃ pāpīmantamevamāha|
211:73: kṣayaṃ praṇetuṃ na kathaṃ hi śakyam||9||
211:78: kṣayaṃ praṇetuṃ ca kathaṃ hi śakyam||10||
211:80: bhaktacchedo mayāsya hi kāritastacchilā punaḥ kṣiptā|
211:96: kṣayaṃ praṇetuṃ ca kathaṃ hi śakyam||14||
211:112: sannāhaṃ baddhvā sasainyasaparivārāḥ āgamiṣyāmo yadasmākam ṛddhibalaviṣayaṃ tatsarvamādarśayiṣyāmaḥ|

211:117: māro'pi pāpimān anuhimavataḥ pārśvaṃ gatvā yatra jyotīrasa ṛṣiḥ prativasati maheśvarabhaktikaḥ aṣṭādaśasu vidyāsthāneṣu ṛddhiviṣayapāramiprāptaḥ pañcaśataparivārastasya maheśvararūpeṇa purataḥ sthitvaivamāha|
211:119: magadhe saṃvasatīha so'dya caratī piṇḍāya rājñorgṛham|
211:120: tena tvaṃ saha saṃlapasva viśadaṃ nānākathābhiḥ sthiraḥ
211:122: atha māraḥ pāpīmānimāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ|
211:124: matto bhoḥ śṛṇutādya yādṛgatulā buddhirmayā cintitā
211:126: tāṃ māyāṃ na vidarśayet svaviṣayāṃ mārorudarpo mahān

211:128: śiṣyāstasya hi ye prahīṇa[pra]madāścaryāṃ caranti dhruvaṃ

211:131: śrutvaitāṃ prakṛtiṃ manovirasatāṃ yāyāt sa śākyarṣabhaḥ||19||
211:136: bhrānto ṛddhimapāsya yāsyati tato nānādiśo vismṛtaḥ||20||
211:141: kṣipraṃ sa sabhayaṃ prayāsyati tato bhūkampahetorvaśam||21||
211:142: vistareṇa yathāsau mārāṇāṃ mārabalaviṣayavikurvatāṃ sarve tathaivācakṣuḥ|
211:143: bhagavāṃśca punaḥ sarvāvatīmimāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrīṃ lokadhātuṃ vajramayīmadhyatiṣṭhat|
211:144: na ca punarbhūyo mārā rāvāṃścakrurna cāturdiśamagniparvatāstasthuḥ|
211:145: na kṛ[ṣṇā]bhrā nākālavāyavo na ca kaścinnāgo'bhipravarṣati sma antaśaḥ ekabindurapi buddhabalādhiṣṭhānena|
211:146: tena khalu punaḥ samayena catvāro mahāśrāvakāḥ pūrvāṇhe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ piṇḍāya praviviśuḥ|
211:147: āyuṣmān śāriputro dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ piṇḍāya praviveśa|
211:148: tatra ca nagare pañcāśanmārakumārakāḥ paramayauvanasurūpā mahatmaveṣasadṛśā nṛtyanto gāyantaḥ saṃceruḥ|
211:149: te āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ gṛhītvā vīthyāṃ dhāvanti sma nṛtyanto gāyantaḥ śāriputramevamāhuḥ|
211:154: te ca sava mārakumārakā dhāvanto gītasvareṇa saha śāriputreṇaivamāhuḥ|
211:156: āghatanāni hi āyatanāni antu karomyahu āyatanānām||22||
211:157: alameva hi skandhakṛtehi vañcitā vayaṃ skandhakṛtehi|
211:158: āghatanāni hi skandhakṛtāni antu karomyahu skandhakṛtānām||23||
211:162: sthaviraḥ śāriputro dhāvan gītasvareṇa imā gāthā imāni ca mantrapadāni bhāṣate sma|
211:163: atha te pañcāśanmārakumārakāḥ paramahṛṣṭāḥ suprasannamanasa evamāhuḥ|
211:168: sarve ca te śāriputrasya vīthīmadhye pādau śirasābhivandya purato niṣedurdharmaśravaṇāya|
211:169: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇa rājagṛhe mahānagare piṇḍāya prāviśat|
211:171: alameva hi dhātumayehi vāñcitā vayaṃ dhātumayehi|
211:172: āghatanāni hi dhātumayāni antu karomyahu dhātumayānām||25||
211:173: alameva hi vedayitehi vañcitā vayaṃ vedayitehi|
211:174: āghatanāni hi vedayitāni antu karomyahu vedayitānām||26||
211:175: alameva hi cetayitehi vañcitā vayaṃ cetayitehi|
211:176: āghatanāni hi cetayitānām antu karomyahu cetayitānām||27||
211:177: alameva hi saṃjñākṛtehi vañcitā vayaṃ saṃjñākṛtehi|
211:178: āghatanāni hi saṃjñākṛtāni antu karomyahu saṃjñākṛtānām||28||
211:179: alameva hi saṃsaritehi vañcitā vayaṃ saṃsaritehi|

211:191: sarve te pañcāśānmārakumārakā vīthīmadhye āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasābhivandya tasyaiva purato niṣedurdharmaśravaṇāya|

211:395: bhrāntāḥ sma asamīkṣya saugatamidaṃ tejovapuḥ śrīghanaṃ

211:415: atha tatraiva gaganaghoṣavatirnāma māraḥ sa uccasvareṇaivamāha|

211:420: atha tatkṣaṇameva sarve mārā gaganatalādavatīrya rājagṛhanagaradvārāṇi saptaratnamayāni cakruḥ|

211:424: kecidavadātā avadātavarṇā mañjiṣṭhavarṇābharaṇavibhūṣaṇāḥ pītān chatradhvajapatākāna dhārayantastasthuḥ|
211:425: kecinmañjiṣṭhā mañjiṣṭhavarṇāḥ suvarṇābharaṇavibhūṣaṇā nīlān chatradhvajapatākān dhārayantastasthuḥ|
211:431: kecit amarakanyāvarṇā nānāratnabhājaneṣu gandhodakaṃ dhārayantaḥ pṛthivīṃ siṣiñcuḥ|

211:435: kecinmārāḥ mārapārṣadyā api yasyāṃ diśi bhagavāṃstadabhimukhā nānāvidhāni maṇiratnāni dadhire bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe|
211:436: kecid vīthīgṛhaśaraṇagavākṣoraṇaharmya-catvaraśṛṅgāṭakakūṭāgāra-dvāra-vṛkṣavimāneṣu sthitvā prāñjalayo niṣeduḥ bhagavata pūjākarmaṇe|
211:437: atha sa māro yadā adrākṣīt sarvāṃstān mārān saparivārān śramaṇagautamaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatān tadā bhūyasyā mātrayā kṣūbdhastrasto bhrāntaḥ prarudannevamāha|

211:439: bhraṣṭo'smi māraviṣayāt kuryāṃ vīryaṃ hi paścimam||85||
211:440: mūlaṃ chindyāmahaṃ padmaṃ sattvā yena diśo'vrajan|
211:441: chedāt padmasya saṃbhrāntā etat syāt paścimaṃ balam||86||
211:442: iti saṃcintya māraḥ pāpīmān vāyuvadavatīrya gaganād yena tatpadmaṃ vīthīgataṃ tena prasṛtya tatpadmamādaṇḍādicchati ūddhartuṃ spraṣṭumapi na śaśāka|
211:443: patrāṇi chettumicchati na ca tāni dadarśuḥ|
211:444: padmakarṇikāmapi pāṇinā parāhantumicchati tāmapi naiva lebhe|
211:445: tad yathā vidyud dṛśyate na copalabhyate|
211:446: tad yathā vā chāyā dṛśyate na copalabhyate|
211:447: evameva tat padmaṃ dṛśyate na copalabhyate|
211:448: yadā ca māraḥ pāpīmān tat padmaṃ dadarśa na copalebhe na pasparśa atha punaḥ sarvaparṣat saṃtrāsanārtham uccaiḥ mahābhairavaṃ svaraṃ moktumicchati tadapi na śaśāka|
211:449: na punarmahābalavegena ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāmicchati mahāpṛthivīṃ parāhantuṃ kampayituṃ tadapi spraṣṭuṃ na śaśāka naivopalebhe|
211:450: tad yathāpi nāma kaścit ākāśamicchet parāmarṣṭuṃ na ca upalabhate|
211:451: evameva māraḥ pāpīmān dadarśa pṛthivīṃ na ca pasparśa nopalebhe|
211:453: yattvahaṃ yathā saṃnipatitānāṃ sattvānāṃ prahāraṃ dadyāṃ cittavikṣepaṃ vā kuryām iti|
211:454: dadarśa tān sattvān na caikasattvamapi upalebhe na ca pasparśa|
211:455: atha bhūyasyā mātrayā māraḥ pāpīmān ruroda|
211:456: buddhanubhāvena cāsya sarvaṃ śarīraṃ vṛkṣavat cakampe|
211:459: yenāhaṃ purato vimohita ida bhrāntiṃ gato'smi kṣaṇāt|
211:460: bhraṣṭo'haṃ viṣayāt svapuṇyabalataḥ kṣīṇaṃ ca me jīvitaṃ
211:461: śīghraṃ yāmi nirākṛtaḥ svabhavanaṃ yāvanna yāmi kṣayam||87||
211:462: svabhavanamapi gantumicchati na tatrāpi śaśāka gantum|
211:466: mā vā me'sya śatrorvā agrato jīvitakṣayaḥ syāt yat tvahamato'ntardhāyeyaṃ sahābuddhakṣetrasya bahirdhā kālaṃ kruyāṃ yathaikasattvo'pi me sahābuddhakṣetre vā kālaṃ kurvantaṃ na paśyet|
211:467: tathāpi na śaknoti antardhātuṃ na digvidikṣu palāyituṃ vā tatraiva kaṇṭhe paṃcabandhanabaddhamātmānaṃ dadarśa|
211:469: hā priyaputrabāndhavajanā na bhūyo drakṣyāma iti|
211:470: atha ghoṣavatirnāma māraścakravartiveṣeṇa niṣaṇṇabhūto māraṃ pāpīmantamevamāha|
211:472: kṣipraṃ sarvajagadvaraṃ munivaraṃ nirbhīḥ śaraṇyaṃ vraja|
211:474: na tvetaṃ samupāsyasi sukhaśamaṃ saukhyaṃ na saṃprāpsyasi||88||
211:476: yattvahaṃ santoṣavacanena śramaṇagautamaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajeyaṃ yadahamebhyo bandhanebhyaḥ parimucyeyam|
211:477: ath māraḥ pāpīmān yasyāṃ diśi bhagavān vijahāra tenāñjaliṃ praṇamyaivamāha|
211:479: evamahaṃ tsaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi| evaṃ cāha|
211:482: mohāndhena mayā tvayi prakupitenoccaiḥ pradoṣaḥ kṛtaḥ
211:483: tat sarvaṃ pratideśayāmi puratastvāṃ sākṣiṇaṃ sthāpya tu||89||
211:484: yadā ca māraḥ pāpīmān santoṣavacanena buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatastadā muktamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte|
211:485: yadā punarasyaivaṃ bhavati prakrameyamiti parṣada iti punareva kaṇṭhe pañcabandhanabaddhamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte|
211:486: yadā punarna kvacid gantuṃ śaśāka tadā bhagavato'ntike trāṇaśaraṇacittamutpādayāmāsa|
211:487: punarmuktamatmānaṃ saṃjānīte yavat saptakṛtvo baddhamuktamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma tatraiva niṣaṇṇaḥ|
